com.socialize.share

Interface ShareHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractShareHandler, EmailShareHandler, FacebookShareHandler, GooglePlusShareHandler, IntentShareHandler, OtherShareHandler, SmsShareHandler, TwitterShareHandler

    public interface ShareHandler
    Handles the transmission of a share.
    Author:
    Jason Polites

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handle(Activity context, SocializeAction action, Location location, String text, SocialNetworkListener listener)
      Handles the share based on its type.
      boolean isAvailableOnDevice(Context context)

        Handles the share based on its type.
